synopsis.text: During his first life, Hiraku Machio was deprived of a vibrant existence due to a severe illness that claimed him at the tender age of 39. However, a divine entity, moved by his plight, grants him a second chance in a realm of fantasy. With renewed health and youth, Hiraku is gifted with an extraordinary farming tool capable of transforming into any agricultural instrument he desires. Embracing this opportunity, Hiraku embarks on a tranquil journey as a farmer, cultivating the land and relishing the simple joys of life. As he nurtures the soil, Hiraku's dream of a peaceful life unfolds, offering a captivating blend of agriculture and fantasy.
